doc.title: 101st Annual Tournament of Roses Parade
doc.plot: The theme of this year's parade, "A World of Harmony" is reflected in the 60 fresh flower floats traveling the 5.5 mile parade route. Joining the festivities are 22 marching bands, 300 Equestrians and the lovely 1990 Rose Queen, Yasmine Delawari.
